resources.string: Please rate how severe the following symptoms have been in the last 12 hours from 0 (symptom not present) to 10 (symptom was as bad as you can imagine it could be).
What was the most stressful or negative event you experienced today?
This service makes sure the application is running at all times. Please activate it during the study.
Activate UPMC sQoL in the accessibility services.
